input.activity_signal: Company website found via search (docomopacific.com) actively promoting services, Wikipedia entry confirms current operations, and recent news article from September 6, 2024 about new Saipan call center expansion shows ongoing business activity. Parent company NTT Docomo is a major Japanese telecom operator.
input.product_summary: DOCOMO Pacific is a full-service telecommunications carrier providing mobile, internet, television, and telephone services to Guam and the Northern Mariana Islands as a subsidiary of Japan's NTT Docomo.
